title: Hotline Miami 2 Wrong Number-FANiSO
description:
Hotline Miami 2: Wrong Number (c) Devolver Digital
Supplied By: A Friend Diskettes: 1 CD
Cracked By: A Friend Game Type: Action
Packaged By: A Friend Released On: March 2015

Hotline Miami 2 is a brutal action game with a view from the
perspective of a bird. The production was developed by the Dennaton
Games studio, which includes a designer, Jonathan Cactus Soederstroem
and a musician, Dennis Wedin, a member of the Fucking Werewolf ASSO
team. The duo has also created the first game in this cycle

In the game, we assume the role of a thug who undertakes a series of
dangerous missions. Most of them boil down to killing every enemy on
the map. In the elimination of the victims we use a wide variety of
weapons and doodads. A lot of task demand a more subtle approach
typical for stealth games

Install

1.) Unpack
2.) Burn or mount
3.) Play the game

LETZ ROCK - LETZ DOPE - LETZ KICK!

System Requirements:

OS: MicrosoftÂ® WindowsÂ® Vista / 7 / 8
Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
Memory: 1 GB RAM
Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU with at least 256MB of VRAM
DirectX: Version 9.0c
Hard Drive: 600 MB available space
Additional Notes: PS4 or Xbox 360 Controller or Direct Input compatible controller[/code]
